name: Mecha Team Maverick
description:
My entry for Mech Jam 2

Quick Story :

The rogue legion a ruthless private army has invaded base MC 979 to attempt to steal the prototype of a new giant mecha with plasma weapons

They have already started to fortify their position on the planet by seting up defences.

It's up to a small merc team of pilots team maverick to try and save the day !

the plan is simple : deploy, destroy all targets of interest to gain back some ground and reach the prototype before it's too late, if they get their hands on it you'll have to destroy it.

Gameplay and Controls :

It's a top down shooter, each level has a number of objectives to destroy (indicated top right) once all objectives of the levels are destroyed you move on to the next one untill you reach the bossfight, 

you can choose between 8 different pilots and their respective mechas, each has their own hp value and one of 4 starter weapons

Controls :

WASD or ZQSD or Arrowkeys = move and select in menus

Mouse Left Click = shoot and confirm choice in menus

Mouse to aim

That's about it for this jam version, hope you'll have fun :)

Credits : 

All assets done solo during the jam, except explosion effects re used from a previous project, and font which comes from google font library
